column4: anyone, at the end of my fisrt install ubuntu said to remove the disk and press enter, it woudl not let me, i had to hit reset, and now there is no ubuntu , just windows
you can probably install ubuntu again.  I think you either chose the wrong options for installing grub, or windows is really really evil
I'm not sure if that's the smartest/easiest way to go about things, but it might work
